com.example.hanoc_000.countriesmaccabi.control

Class MainPresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.hanoc_000.countriesmaccabi.control.MainPresenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MainContract.Presenter

    public class MainPresenter
extends java.lang.Object
implements MainContract.Presenter
    The unit that connects between the data provider (RestCountries API) and the views (activities).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private RestCountriesApi api
      The Retrofit description of the RestCountries API endpoints.
      private rx.Scheduler backgroundScheduler
      The Scheduler on which our API request will operate.
      private rx.Scheduler mainScheduler
      the Scheduler on which we want our observer to wait for the API request callbacks.
      private rx.subscriptions.CompositeSubscription subscriptions 
      private MyActivity view
      An instance (can be a mock) of MyActivity type Activity.

      • subscribe

        public void subscribe()
        Description copied from interface: MainContract.Presenter
        Notify the presenter that its view has become active. This is used to trigger the API request.
        Specified by:
        subscribe in interface MainContract.Presenter

      • unSubscribe

        public void unSubscribe()
        Description copied from interface: MainContract.Presenter
        Notify the presenter that its view has become inactive. This is used to cancel any previous request that hasn't returned yet.
        Specified by:
        unSubscribe in interface MainContract.Presenter

        The activity is being destroyed.
